name: social-graph-visualizer
description: A simple visualizer for social graphs.
author: Georgios Rassias <georassias@gmail.com>

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development webpack -c -i src/index.js -o dist/sgv.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/sgv.min.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.examples:test: yarn run examples:prepare && yarn run examples:run
